description: Giovanni`s Rhydon was lent to Jessie, James, and Meowth before Giovanni took a leave of absence in order to protect the Viridian City Gym if anyone wished to challenge the Gym Leader. During Jessie`s Gym Battle battle with Ash, Ash`s Pidgeotto used Quick Attack followed by Double Edge on it. Shortly after, it was defeated when Pikachu used Thunderbolt on Jessie`s whole team.
name: Sidon (Sakaki)
